name: Kick Bot (itch)
description:
Kick Bot is a 2-button precision wall jumping game that takes place inside a giant robot leg on the Moon!

Wall jump, slide, butt stomp, and dash past dozens of devious robot-crushing obstacles with only two buttons! Stop an evil AI from kicking Earth by destroying the GigaLeg, a giant moon-mounted robot leg.

Demo Features:

  • Wall jump, slide, butt stomp, and dash through 8 levels to see what Kick Bot is all about!
  • Simple two-button controls, but many challenging maneuvers to master
  • Respawn fast! There's no time to waste
  • Crisp pixel-art visuals inspired by the 16-bit handheld console generation
  • Heart-pounding electronic soundtrack by Jake Mercer

Full game will include:

  • Wall jump, slide, butt stomp, and dash through 7 unique worlds and over 100 tough-as-nails levels
  • Plug in USB drives to unlock secret extra-challenging levels
  • Over 25 unique music tracks (soundtrack will be available at launch)
